data.name: WhatsApp - Large screen enhancements
data.description: Enhances the WhatsApp web layout for large screens. Features: • Makes WhatsApp web take all available viewport. • Allows the customization of the font sizes used. • Allows the setup of a custom chat background. Legend: 1. Min 48px / max 64px.
